meta.job_title: Patient Care Tech Transplant Care Unit

duties_responsibilities.duty: Delivering high quality, patient-centered care by performing a variety of patient care services related to common nursing functions and activities of daily living.
Assisting nursing staff in providing patient care and maintaining a clean, well-organized, and safe patient care environment.
Participating in the implementation of nursing care plans and obtaining/recording patient information throughout the cycle of care.
Assisting with patient mobility, transfer, and use of medical aids.
Assisting with specimen collection, patient activities of daily living, and serving as a Monitor/Telemetry Tech for the unit as needed.
Engaging in evidence-based best practices that enhance the patient experience and complying with hospital policies/procedures.

education_certification.credential: Full vaccination for COVID-19 based on local, state, or federal law or regulations
